form.official-title: To authorize a major medical facility project for the Department of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2026 in St. Louis, Missouri, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fiscal Year 2025 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act.

section.header: Authorization of major medical facility project of Department of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2026 in St. Louis, Missouri

subsection.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs may carry out a major medical facility project in fiscal year 2026 in St. Louis, Missouri, that consists of the construction of a new bed tower, clinical building expansion, consolidated administrative building and warehouse, utility plant, and parking garages, in an amount not to exceed $1,762,668,000.

There is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2026 or the year in which funds are appropriated for the Construction, Major Projects account, $1,762,668,000 for the project authorized in subsection (a).
